name: Resource
description: The AWS::ApiGateway::Resource resource creates a resource in an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) API.

properties.name: ParentId
properties.description: If you want to create a child resource, the ID of the parent resource.

properties.name: PathPart
properties.description: A path name for the resource.

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.description: The ID of the RestApi resource in which you want to create this resource.
